fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may multitask.
**Divine Bees** — You start with 1 bee. When you use an ability, add or subtract power according to the ability. You may not use abilities that cost more power than you have. If you would be attacked, instead the attacker learns that your Defense was too strong and you lose power equal to the level of the attack— Basic: 1, Powerful: 2, Unstoppable: 3, Overkill+: 4. You still die if you're hanged.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
`+1`: You gain roleblock, redirection, and detection immunity for the night. This ability will automatically be used every night.
`-1`: Stun a player, preventing them from using an ability the following night.
`-2`: Investigate a player, learning their role.
`-3`: Deal a Powerful attack to a player.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose the game.
